title: Chat Restriction
body:
Basically got chat blocked for 10 games and all i did was defend a Graves whose net cut out  during my ranked game. From the logs supplied the worst i said was: "they bitch" and "dont give me ur crap". While the other THREE players on my team were tell graves to go die and would not stop intentionally feeding. Yet i get chat blocked for trying to defend a poor guy who is getting the hell abused out of him?.

I realize 10 games is not much but i only enjoy ranked play (same for basically all my games) and this chat restriction makes it really hard to enjoy ranked as people in silver don't usually recognize pings or don't understand them 100%, 1 message every 4 mins is impossible to work with. Especially when a champ gets fed and your trying to explain how to deal with him in fights.

Not completely sure if this in the right section but i tried to find it and this section sounded pretty legit considering its a support area.

Unblocking chat restriction would be awesome if you deem it worthy.
Thanks for reading. 

(If this is wrong link me to correct area or move please)

replies.body:
Hey ix Calamity,


As this is a discussion pertaining to one of the Player Behavior & Reform systems [Chat Restriction] in League of Legends, the best place for this discussion would be the [**Player Behavior & Moderation**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) sub-boards. I, another Arbiter, or a member of the community would love to have a more in-depth conversation with you about this topic there!
